author: Yahya

review: Great product. Just wish amazon wouldn't block amazon prime on it.
author: Weljen

review: I had an asus cube prior to the chromecast and it was a nightmare. The cube would constantly drop the internet connection and the video quality was horrible. The chromecast had the easiest set up, 5 minutes, great video quality and no internet connection problems what so ever. I have been using this product for over three months and it's seriously a dream. My only complaint is that I wish it was compatible with many other apps instead of just the very few they have available. Other than that I highly recommend it.
author: Jennifer Torres

review: Chromecasts continue to impress me, so I have put them on all the TVs in my house.  I got most of them on sale for $25, but at $35 they are still well worth it.  One of my favorite features is that when we have people over I use youtube to cast music videos, then I give my guests the password to the wifi so that anyone can add a youtube music video to the queue.  Android or iPhone, it doesn't matter, everyone can add their favorites.  I have had a lot of really positive comments after some parties we have had, everyone really gets a kick out of adding their own songs to the playlist.
author: A. Hilton

review: This thing hardly works. They rarely upgrade the app. It freezes all the time in the middle of movies or shows. I have to switch back to the device I am using, either IPAD or Mac. When I switch back the app or webpage crashes. It will give me the option to use chromcast in my abc and CBS apps on my iPad. Then a week later an update comes and chromcast stops becoming an option. Apple TV or Roku may be a better option.I even gave chromcast the benefit of the doubt and used it through my wifi network at home and the wifi network that I can produce from my phone. The same problems persist. It's a good idea that doesn't quite work yet.
author: Edward Danielian

review: Love it never have any problems with it!
